text: my name is Oliver Nicolini I'm the CTO
at er√§
and we have products that enable
communication in the education space we
started out at Oxford a few years ago we
were students and we were experiencing
the clunkiness the difficulty of use and
bad user experience of the learning
management system which was the system
in place at the time and we decided that
there must have been a better way to
communicate to foster teaching and
learning really and to have that at the
center so we decided to build our
business first of all in the cloud and
then AWS came as a great choice once we
explore all the options because it allow
us flexibility scalability at I would
say a managed cost so we run in our
entire platform on AWS so production
workloads development workloads any kind
of workload that are ranging from
databases to websites to internal
portals and internal networks at my
personal advice to any entrepreneur
starting would be if it's not already
the case to start using cloud solution
and to move away from physical solution
into that AWS in my opinion as the best
bets offering the most reliable and the
most flexible services that are out
there with a great cost efficiency for
any company
[Music]
